#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#define TAM 1000001
using namespace std;

double dp[TAM];
void dpI(){
    dp[0]=0;
    for(long i = 1; i < TAM;i++){
        dp[i]=dp[i-1]+log10((double)i);
    }
}
int main(){
    //freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    int t,c;
    dpI();
    while(scanf("%d",&t)!=EOF){
        for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
            scanf("%d",&c);
            printf("%.0f\n",ceil(dp[c]));
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
